content: @Chris Moesel Thank you very much.
@Chris Moesel , when sharing the CDS artifact in the CDS Connect Repository, does that CDS artifact have to be authored and present in the CDS AT? Thanks.

Hi Tien -- No. There is no requirement that the Authoring Tool be used at all in order to share an artifact in the repository. The CDS Connect Repository has artifacts that have been authored in many different ways. When you share your CQL in the repository, you just upload a zip file.
